definition: Significant positive achievements such as winning an award, overcoming a & challenge, learning a skill, or completing their education.
Current age, usually expressed in years.
Type of clothes worn, excluding held items. NUDE if the character is wearing nothing.
Attitude, opinion or evaluation held towards something or someone.
Demeanor, manners, bearing, or outward behavior.
Eye color, eye shape, or any other attributes of the eyes.
Goal or motive of the character, or what they are trying to achieve.
Hair color, hair type or other attributes of the hair. Exclude facial hair.
Special unique qualities, skills, or abilities.
Quality, tone, pitch, accent, or any other attributes of the voice.
